Description: 🇺🇸🇪🇬⚡- The meeting between Egypt's President, Abdel Fattah El-Sisi, and US Secretary of State, Antony Blinken, begins in El Alamein, northern Egypt.

Description: 🇵🇸🇮🇱⚡️- The IDF reports that it was able to recover 6 hostages from tunnels in Khan Yunis, although all 6 of those rescued did not survive.

Description: 🇱🇧🇮🇱⚡️- Upwards of 55 rockets were fired from Lebanon into northern Israel and the occupied Golan Heights. Multiple fires have been reported in the Golan Heights as a result.

Title: 🇺🇸⚡️- Longtime Biden aides are upset at the DNC for pushing Bid...
Description: 🇺🇸⚡️- Longtime Biden aides are upset at the DNC for pushing Biden out of primetime, one texting a CNN journalist: -This is awful. He literally set up a campaign and handed it over to them—do they have to cut him out of prime time?-

Title: ↩️ 🇺🇸⚡️- The other major networks also planned for the event to...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇺🇸⚡️- The first night of the DNC has gone on so long that CSPAN ended its livestream expecting it to be over by 11:00PM 🇺🇸⚡️- The other major networks also planned for the event to be over by 11 and have had to delay regular programming to continue coverage. Commentators are speculating the DNC lengthened its speaking times to minimize the viewership of Bidens keynote speech.

Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇸🇩⚡- -We will not allow just a group of terrified generals who fled the capital to control the fate of our people,- – General Hemedti, Commander of the Rapid Support Forces in Sudan. 🇸🇩⚡- General Hemedti says the Rapid Support is open to -establishing a separate state in western and southern Sudan- and that the Rapid Support have -many options that we are capable of implementing whenever that becomes necessary-.

Description: 🇺🇸🇵🇸⚡️- In Chicago, pro-Palestine protesters breached the security perimeter surrounding the Democratic National Convention venue. Police are using force to disperse the protesters.
